author: Source: TheBostonChannel.com
title: Despite ban, HS coach prays on field after game - TheBostonChannel.com
text:
The assistant football coach at Bremerton High School in Washington state was being joined by some of his opponents and fans -- some of whom had come to the game to pray with him. After the Knights' homecoming loss to the Centralia Tigers, Kennedy walked to the middle of the football field, hoping to say his usual thanks to God by himself.
Start the conversation, or Read more at TheBostonChannel.com.
